fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
The first three town members to die will be converted to your cause, and may use their abilities in secret at night.
You may choose to revive all of your ghostly friends at the end of a night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If you die, the converted town members will revert to the town, the town members may not use their abilities on you unless they are protective.
